## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (e042ae78ceddd02bdc0322335129fae59e6a87c65f8ca2578ce24c2f99b88d3a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'aem-core-react-components' @ 6.6.7 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
